Welcome to the Unit Manager Tool

This tool allows you to create and manage multiple units within the 3Dtracking system. Use the menu on the left to navigate between different functionalities.

Unit Creation

This tool implements a tracker and unit creation within the 3Dtracking platform. Please upload an excel file with the required unit information to proceed with the creation process.

Drag the excel file here.

Update Attributes

This section allows you to update attributes of existing units. Select the attributes you wish to modify and apply the changes. Please upload an excel file with the required unit information to proceed with the creation process.

Drag the excel file here.
